sentences.en: After pay various bequest the residue of his estate is split between his children.
sentences.cn: 当偿付各种遗赠物后,他的剩余财产分给了他的孩子们.

sentences.en: After paying various bequest the residue of his estate is split between his children.
sentences.cn: 在支付各种遗赠后,剩下的遗产在孩子之间分配.

sentences.en: He left a bequest to each of his grandchildren.
sentences.cn: 他给他的孙辈每人留下一笔遗产。

sentences.en: He left bequest of money to all his servants.
sentences.cn: 他对所有的仆人都遗赠了一些金钱.

sentences.en: He left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest.
sentences.cn: 他是在折损了遗产一半价值的条件下遗留给他的.

sentences.en: He received a bequest under his grandmother's will.
sentences.cn: 他得到他祖母遗嘱项下的遗赠.

sentences.en: Mucha's bequest to his country was received with unkindly cold shoulders.
sentences.cn: 慕夏为祖国留下的遗产受到了残酷而冷淡的对待.

sentences.en: Our only two lasting bequest to our children. One is roots ; the other is wings.
sentences.cn: 我们给孩子永不退色的两份遗产---根和翅膀.

sentences.en: The bequest is con-servatively estimated at £30 million.
sentences.cn: 保守估计，这笔遗产有3,000万英镑。

sentences.en: The bequest would be found in his will , and would be paid over.
sentences.cn: 这笔遗产将在他的遗嘱里做出交代, 会如数付清.

sentences.en: The church here was left a bequest to hire doctors who would work amongst the poor.
sentences.cn: 这个教堂接收到一笔遗产，可以用来聘请医生为穷人治病。

sentences.en: THE following chapters are, in a sense, the execution of a bequest.
sentences.cn: 以下各章, 在某种程度上是实现遗愿.

sentences.en: The library has received a generous bequest from a local businessman.
sentences.cn: 图书馆从当地一位商人那里得到了一大笔遗赠.

sentences.en: The picture was acquired by bequest in 1921.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是在1921年通过遗赠获得的.

sentences.en: To receive by bequest or as a legacy.
sentences.cn: 接受(做为遗赠物或遗产 )

words.tran_cn: 遗赠；把…遗赠给；把…传下去

trans.tran_en: money or property that you arrange to give to someone after your death
